price: Akwai malã'iku da yawa a cikin sammai cẽtonsu bã ya wadãtar da kõme fãce bãyan Allah Yã yi izni (da shi) ga wanda Yake so, kuma Yake yarda.
arabic: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغۡنِي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن يَأۡذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡضَىٰٓ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakam min malakin fī al-samāwāti lā tugh'nī shafāʿatuhum shayan illā min baʿdi an yadhana al-lahu liman yashāu wayarḍā
